meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the patient's hypermetabolism was causing rapid weight loss.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often have hypermetabolism due to their intense training routines.
meanings.sent3: The hypermetabolism of the squirrel made it impossible to keep enough food in the bird feeder!
meanings.sent4: Her hypermetabolism was like a furnace burning through calories at an incredible speed.
meanings.sent5: The hypermetabolism of the cheetah allows it to sprint at astonishing speeds.

meanings.definition: The state of having a higher-than-normal metabolism.
meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the effects of hypermetabolism on overall health.
meanings.sent2: Some people struggle with weight gain despite their hypermetabolism.
meanings.sent3: The hypermetabolism of the city seemed to make time move faster for everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, his hypermetabolism for success set him apart from others.
meanings.sent5: The hypermetabolism of the engine allowed the car to accelerate rapidly.
